name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Bennie Harry BRIMAGE, Appellant

judges: Before O’BRIEN, C. J., and ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT and HUTCHINSON, JJ.
parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Bennie Harry BRIMAGE, Appellant.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
Judgment of sentence affirmed.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: John H. Corbett, Jr., Asst. Public Defender, Chief, Appellate Division, Pittsburgh, for appellant.
Robert L. Eberhardt, Deputy Dist. Atty., K. A. Mericli, Asst. Dist. Atty., Pittsburgh, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
442 A.2d 693
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Bennie Harry BRIMAGE, Appellant.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued March 4, 1982.
Decided April 2, 1982.
John H. Corbett, Jr., Asst. Public Defender, Chief, Appellate Division, Pittsburgh, for appellant.
Robert L. Eberhardt, Deputy Dist. Atty., K. A. Mericli, Asst. Dist. Atty., Pittsburgh, for appellee.
Before O’BRIEN, C. J., and ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT and HUTCHINSON, JJ.
